ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Breath of Harmony?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, a High Elf Cleric friend of mine went through a great deal of effort to get one, and was quite irritated to find that she couldn t equip it.  Pretty odd
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, a High Elf Cleric friend of mine went through a great deal of effort to get one, and was quite
irritated to find that she couldn't equip it. Pretty odd combinations there.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 54 songs (for the 3rd time), Innoruuk


James Schuldes wrote:

> Uhm better check the stats on the I-Hoop:
>
> Ivandyr's Hoop - AC 6
> Slot: Ears
> Weight: 0.1 - DEF, ERU, GNM, HEF, HUM, OGR, TRL
> Classes: CLR, ENC, MAG, NEC, RNG, ROG, SHD, SHM, WAR, WIZ
> Effect: Spirit Tap
> Charges: 6
> (Magic) (Lore)
> (INT +6) (WIS +6) (HP +6)
>
> Nice AC but bard's can't wear them =/ Kind of a wierd race-class combo on
> this item.
>
> Sylly
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, October 17, 2000 12:43 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Breath of Harmony?
>
> Any idea anyone how much the breath of harmony SELLS for? I figure i'll have
> about 15,000pp saved up by the time im 45, maybe 20,000 if i keep at it till
> 46 if i stay at the giants in rathe. Might just try to get an ivandir's
> hoop, if i get one i'll have even more cash/items to trade while im at it in
> that general area.
>
> Minkin
> lev 41 bard
> Sol Ro
